item.title: There are stickers on the traffic light at the junction of Portman Square and Wigmore Street. The stickers are on all four traffic light at each junction and they are politically motivated stickers., 18th August

item.title: Junction of FLoyd Road and Church Lane., 18th August
item.description:
Biffa bins overflowing. Stacks of bin bags and unbagged items also. Dirty and unsightly. Never any improvement at this spot. Why no council action?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Floyd Road, Charlton, London
